web.gui.secretary.testJUnit

Class TestEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • web.gui.secretary.testJUnit.TestEnvironment

  • public class TestEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    define the secretary log in to system.
    get user (teacher/student) from database to test AddUser, EditUser, ViewUser.
    get subject from database to test AddSubject, EditSubject, and ViewSubject.
    Author:
    maint
